title: Maruti Suzuki: Pioneering innovation with its startup initiatives
description: Maruti Suzuki's startup initiative supported over 3,000 startups, engaging with 88 and collaborating with 21 to foster automotive innovation in India. The program provided industry guidance, market validation, access to Maruti Suzuki cars, and funding opportunities. It aimed to integrate cutting-edge technologies through collaboration and co-creation, driving significant advancements in the automotive sector.
